description: Relocation of existing corner section of perimiter railings.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the approved drawings, prior to the commencement of works adjacent to T17 of LBI TPO (No.297) 2006 relevant Council officers and the applicant shall meet onsite to confirm the following:
- Detailed arrangement and location of the relocated railings.
- Detailed arrangement and location of railing foundations including padstones.
Details of any changes to soil level.

Revised plans based on the onsite meeting of the position of the railings to be submitted for approval by the Local Planning Authority. The plans are to include cross sections of the foundations, concrete wall, metal capping and railings. The plans must also include changes to the soil level and any excavations.  Works shall be carried out in accordance with the plan hereby agreed.

Reason: To preserve the setting of the statutorily listed building and to avoid inappropriate excavations and damage to the roots of a tree protected by a Tree Preservation Order.
